pageTitle: Prime Minister of Canada announces by-elections | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced that by-elections will be held on December 11, 2017, in the following four electoral districts:

  • Bonavista—Burin—Trinity, Newfoundland and Labrador
  • Scarborough—Agincourt, Ontario
  • Battlefords—Lloydminster, Saskatchewan
  • South Surrey—White Rock, British Columbia
